outputs.output_descr: Develop capacities to carry out Poverty and Social Impact Analysis (PSIA) and to use this analysis in designing national development strategies in African countries.
To contribute to accelerating progress towards the attainment of the MDGs in at least 40 RBA countries through strengthened national technical and institutional capacities.

Facilitate the internalization and therefore better application of the MDG-based planning processes and translation of the MDG needs assessments into medium-term planning frameworks underpinned by MDG-consistent macroeconomic policies.

Strengthen national technical and institutional capacities to formulate, implement and effectively monitor MDG-based national development and poverty reduction strategies in at least 40 RBA countries.
